```json
[
```

#### 第3个文档：《Long short-term memory》

```json
[
  {
    "algorithm_entity": {
      "algorithm_id": "Hochreiter1997_LSTM",
      "entity_type": "Algorithm",
      "name": "LSTM",
      "year": 1997,
      "authors": ["Sepp Hochreiter", "Jürgen Schmidhuber"],
      "task": "Solving long time lag problems",
      "dataset": ["Artificial data", "Embedded Reber Grammar", "2-sequence problem", "Adding problem", "Multiplication problem", "Temporal order problem"],
      "metrics": ["Success rate", "Number of sequence presentations", "Mean squared error"],
      "architecture": {
        "components": ["Memory cells", "Input gates", "Output gates"],
        "connections": ["Fully connected hidden layer", "Fixed self-connections"],
        "mechanisms": ["Constant error carousel", "Truncated backpropagation"]
      },
      "methodology": {
        "training_strategy": ["Stochastic gradient descent", "Truncated BPTT"],
        "parameter_tuning": ["Learning rate", "Weight initialization", "Gate biases"]
      },
      "feature_processing": ["Logistic sigmoid", "Identity function", "Gaussian noise"]
    }
  },
  {
    "dataset_entity": {
      "dataset_id": "Embedded_Reber_Grammar_1989",
      "entity_type": "Dataset",
      "name": "Embedded Reber Grammar",
      "description": "A synthetic dataset for testing recurrent neural networks",
      "domain": "Natural language processing",
      "size": 256,
      "year": 1989,
      "creators": ["Smith, A. W.", "Zipser, D."]
    }
  },
  {
    "metric_entity": {
      "metric_id": "Success_rate_LongTimeLag",
      "entity_type": "Metric",
      "name": "Success rate",
      "description": "Percentage of successful trials in solving long time lag problems",
      "category": "Long time lag problem solving",
      "formula": "Successful trials / Total trials"
    }
  },
  {
    "metric_entity": {
      "metric_id": "MSE_Error",
      "entity_type": "Metric",
      "name": "Mean Squared Error",
      "description": "Average squared difference between predicted and actual values",
      "category": "Regression",
      "formula": "Sum of squared errors / Number of samples"
    }
  }
]
```

#### 第4个文档：《Elevating the Role of Image Understanding in Visual Question Answering》

```json
[
  {
    "algorithm_entity": {
      "algorithm_id": "Goyal2017_VQABalancedDataset",
      "entity_type": "Algorithm",
      "name": "VQA Balanced Dataset",
      "year": 2017,
      "authors": ["Yash Goyal", "Tejas Khot", "Douglas Summers-Stay", "Dhruv Batra", "Devi Parikh"],
      "task": "Visual Question Answering",
      "dataset": ["VQA_v2.0_2017"],
      "metrics": ["Accuracy_VQA", "Recall@5"],
      "architecture": {
        "components": ["Image embedding", "Question embedding", "Counter-example explanation"],
        "connections": ["Point-wise multiplication", "Fully connected layers"],
        "mechanisms": ["Hard negative mining", "Pairwise hinge ranking loss"]
      },
      "methodology": {
        "training_strategy": ["Supervised learning", "Crowdsourcing"],
        "parameter_tuning": ["Trade-off weight parameter", "Hyperparameter M"]
      },
      "feature_processing": ["Stanford dependency parser", "VGGNet features", "ResNet features"]
    }
  },
  {
    "dataset_entity": {
      "dataset_id": "VQA_v2.0_2017",
      "entity_type": "Dataset",
      "name": "VQA v2.0",
      "description": "Balanced Visual Question Answering dataset",
      "domain": "Computer vision and natural language processing",
      "size": 1100000,
      "year": 2017,
      "creators": ["Yash Goyal", "Tejas Khot", "Douglas Summers-Stay", "Dhruv Batra", "Devi Parikh"]
    }
  },
  {
    "metric_entity": {
      "metric_id": "Accuracy_VQA",
      "entity_type": "Metric",
      "name": "Accuracy",
      "description": "Accuracy in Visual Question Answering",
      "category": "VQA evaluation",
      "formula": "Correct answers / Total questions"
    }
  },
  {
    "metric_entity": {
      "metric_id": "Recall@5_VQA",
      "entity_type": "Metric",
      "name": "Recall@5",
      "description": "Recall at top-5 predictions in Visual Question Answering",
      "category": "VQA evaluation",
      "formula": "Human-picked counter-examples in top-5 predictions / Total counter-examples"
    }
  }
]
```

#### 第5个文档：《Mapping to Declarative Knowledge for Word Problem Solving》

```json
[
  {
    "algorithm_entity": {
      "algorithm_id": "Roy2018_DeclarativeKnowledgeSolver",
      "entity_type": "Algorithm",
      "name": "Declarative Knowledge Solver",
      "year": 2018,
      "authors": ["Subhro Roy", "Dan Roth"],

      "dataset": ["AllArith_2015", "Perturb_2018", "Aggregate_2018"],

        "components": ["Math concepts", "Declarative rules"],
        "connections": ["Dependency parser", "Coreference resolution"],
        "mechanisms": ["Latent variable modeling", "Beam search"]

      "methodology": {
        "training_strategy": ["Supervised learning", "Crowdsourcing"],

    }
  },
  {
    "dataset_entity": {
      "dataset_id": "AllArith_2015",

  {

      "dataset_id": "Perturb_2018",
      "entity_type": "Dataset",

      "size": 661,
      "year": 2018,
      "creators": ["Subhro Roy", "Dan Roth"]
    }
  },
  {
    "dataset_entity": {
      "dataset_id": "Aggregate_2018",
      "entity_type": "Dataset",

      "domain": "Elementary education",
      "size": 1492,
      "year": 2018,
      "creators": ["Subhro Roy", "Dan Roth"]
    }
  },
  {
    "metric_entity": {
      "metric_id": "Accuracy_MathWordProblem",
      "entity_type": "Metric",
      "name": "Accuracy",
      "description": "Accuracy in solving arithmetic word problems",
      "category": "Math word problem solving",
      "formula": "Correctly solved problems / Total problems"
    }
  }
```

1. **刚刚提取的是哪个小节**：已完成所有文档的小节提取。
